summary: Implements a Microsoft SQL Server backend for Feast's offline store, providing configuration handling, data source reading and writing via Ibis, and support for extracting full tables, custom queries, and retrieving historical or latest feature values for batch processing and model training.
business_intent: Allow Feast users to leverage an existing MSâ€¯SQL Server database as the offline feature store, enabling efficient batch writes, feature extraction, and historical/latest feature retrieval within feature engineering pipelines.
